BUT THE COUNSEL IN SOME CASES BROADENS TO THE HEALTH AND EDUCATIONAL INTERESTS, AND CERTAIN PRINCIPLES THAT HAVE A BROAD 

142 

APPLICATION ARE SUGGESTED. (SEE COMPREHENSIVE INDEX TO THE WRITINGS OF ELLEN G. WHITE UNDER THE FOLLOWING ENTRIES: CENTRALIZATION, CONFEDERACY, CONSOLIDATION, COLONIZATION, COOPERATION, REVIEW AND HERALD PUBLISHING HOUSE, PACIFIC PRESS PUBLISHING ASSOCIATION, SOUTHERN PUBLISHING ASSOCIATION.)
